abilities.description: Allows the user to create powerful earthquakes and shockwaves

keyMoments.title: Gura Gura no Mi Nullified by Darkness
keyMoments.description: The Gura Gura no Mi's earthquake powers are nullified when Blackbeard uses his Yami Yami no Mi to negate Devil Fruit abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even the world's strongest Devil Fruit can be countered by the Yami Yami no Mi's unique properties.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Dies - Gura Gura no Mi Lost
keyMoments.description: When Whitebeard dies, the Gura Gura no Mi returns to circulation, eventually to be stolen by Blackbeard.
keyMoments.significance: The loss of the user means the fruit will reappear somewhere in the world.

weaknesses.weakness: Can be nullified by Yami Yami no Mi
weaknesses.description: Blackbeard's darkness power can completely negate the Gura Gura no Mi's abilities.

notes: Considered one of the strongest Paramecia-type Devil Fruits, capable of destroying the world. After Whitebeard's death, this fruit is later obtained by Blackbeard in Episode 486.

abilities.description: Allows the user to create and control darkness
Can nullify other Devil Fruit powers through physical contact
Can pull objects and people toward the user using darkness

keyMoments.title: Yami Yami no Mi Nullifies Whitebeard's Powers
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard demonstrates the Yami Yami no Mi's unique ability to nullify other Devil Fruit powers by negating Whitebeard's Gura Gura no Mi abilities through physical contact.
keyMoments.significance: This is the first time the fruit's Devil Fruit nullification ability is explicitly demonstrated in a major battle, showcasing why Blackbeard sought this specific fruit.

weaknesses.weakness: Attracts attacks - user takes more damage than normal
weaknesses.description: Unlike other Logia fruits, the Yami Yami no Mi doesn't allow the user to become intangible. Instead, it attracts all attacks, causing the user to take more pain than normal.

notes: Blackbeard specifically sought this Devil Fruit for its unique ability to nullify other Devil Fruit powers, which is key to his plan. This episode showcases the fruit's strategic value in combat against other Devil Fruit users.
